description:
Young couple (Linda Hamilton and Peter Norton) witnesses horrific murder and goes to Gatlin, the nearest town to warn the authorities. Isaac managed to convince them to murder every adult to a bloody ritual. Indeed, the sacrifices are necessary, because the blood is used to fertilize a sacred crop. And now we just have the couple struggle to escape the same fate.
